701756f-a.text:
Schurs Ave., at Davis Ave., showing the Alfred H. Morris Mansion. It stands in the middle of the thoroughfare and was later known (according to Bromley's 1927 map) as the Riviera Inn.
June 1926.
Brown Brothers.
